text:
- (GLASS BREAKS)
- (SCREAMS)
I'm gonna kill that kid!

- (GLASS BREAKS)
- (MARV SCREAMS)

- Marv!
- Harry?

- Why the hell did you take your shoes off? 
- Why the hell are you dressed like a chicken?

I'm up here, you morons!
Come and get me!
BOTH: Whoa!

You guys give up,
or you thirsty for more?
(GROANS)

- Heads up!
- Huh?

- (THUD)
- (YELLS)

Don't worry, Marv.
I'll get him for ya.

- Harry!
- Ow!
Yes!

He's only a kid, Harry.
We can take him.

- Aw, shut up, will ya!
- Oh!

- What is it?
- You're missin' some teeth.

Where? It's my gold tooth.
My gold tooth. I'll kill him! I'll kill him!

You bomb me with one more can, kid,
and I'll snap off your cojones and
boil them in motor oil!

- OPERATOR: 911 Emergency.
- Hello. My house is being robbed.

My address is 656 Lincoln Boulevard.
My name's Murphy.
